video_summary.description: A melancholy Homer Simpson drinks beer and contemplates his lack of ambition.
Homer receives a surprise job offer from a nuclear plant in a different town.
Homer enthusiastically prepares for his job interview, with Professor Frink's help.
Using a high-tech earpiece, Professor Frink secretly gives Homer the correct answers during the interview.
Homer's success on the job greatly improves the Simpsons' standard of living.
Homer's earpiece tricks are exposed, thanks to his suspiciously intelligent responses.
After the truth comes to light, Homer dramatically quits his job at the nuclear plant.
Homer crashes down a hill on his skis, bringing his deceptive high life to a firm close.
Homer is back at the old plant, remarking that he learned a lesson but will likely forget it.
